title: BloodGore1 SoundEffect
longDescription:
https://youtu.be/908ADkQhMSo < Youtube Preview



📖Overview.

The BloodGore Sound Effects Pack is a comprehensive collection of sound effects suitable for scenes and themes involving blood, bleeding, fractures, and damage to the body and organs. It is designed for use in games, films, and animation projects. This pack offers a variety of sound effects categorized into themes such as blood, spill, spurt, bash, crush, hit, kick, punch, smash, chunks, guts, break, squelch, stab, fall, movement, and more. With stereo and mono audio files provided, you have the flexibility to use them as UI sound effects or location-specific game effects.



🕹️Functionality.

  • Diverse Sound Effects: This pack provides a wide range of sound effects suitable for violent scenes and themes, enhancing the realism and intensity of your projects.
  • Stereo and Mono Files: Audio files are provided in both stereo and mono formats, allowing you to freely use them as UI sound effects or location-specific game effects.
  • Versatile Use: Ideal for integrating graphic and violent audio experiences into various projects, including games, films, animations, and more.



📂FILES. (TrackList)

  • Blood_Bubble 22
  • Blood_Spill 25
  • Blood_Spurt 22
  • Body_Bash 14
  • Body_Crush 10
  • Body_Hit 9
  • Body_Kick 16
  • Body_Punch 16
  • Body_Smash 10
  • Flesh_Chunks 26
  • Flesh_Movements 10
  • FX_Break 79
  • FX_Squelch 58
  • FX_Stab 42
  • FX_Texture 30
  • Guts_Fall 14
  • Guts_Movements 24


⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.


  • Youtube Playlist
  • Reselling and using for AI training purposes are explicitly prohibited. It must be used as part of personal and corporate projects only.
